mal:requestIP.name: get
mal:requestIP.comment: Gets a Planning Request by ID

mal:field.name: planningRequestId
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request ID

mal:field.name: planningRequest
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request

mal:errorRef.comment: The Planning Request does not exist

mal:requestIP.name: list
mal:requestIP.comment: Gets Planning Requests according to the given filter

mal:requestIP.name: add
mal:requestIP.comment: Submits a Planning Request. Provider does not have to process it immediately. Provider assigns a unique Identifierto the Planning Request. Subsequent modifications and inquiries about the Planning Request can be done using that ID. Once submitted, the Planning Request's status is SUBMITTED. SUBMITTED does not mean that the PR has been validated

mal:field.name: planningRequestDefinitionIdentifier
mal:field.comment: PlanningRequestDefinition ID, that corresponds to the PlanningRequest instance

mal:field.name: planningRequest
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request that is submitted

mal:field.name: planningRequestId
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request ID

mal:submitIP.name: update
mal:submitIP.comment: Updates the Planning Request by ID

mal:field.name: planningRequestId
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request ID

mal:field.name: planningRequestIdentifier
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request that will be referenced by the Planning Request ID

mal:errorRef.comment: The Planning Request does not exist

mal:submitIP.name: remove
mal:submitIP.comment: Removes a Planning Request by ID

mal:field.name: planningRequestId
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request ID

mal:errorRef.comment: The Planning Request does not exist

mal:pubsubIP.name: monitorPlanningRequests
mal:pubsubIP.comment: Subscribe to Planning Request monitoring. Monitoring events are published whenever a Planning Request is submitted, updated, deleted, or some Planning Request Status changes. This method notifies about Planning Request changes that match the given filter.

mal:requestIP.name: listDefinition
mal:requestIP.comment: Retrieves Planning Request Definition based on Identifier (name)

mal:field.name: identifierList
mal:field.comment: List of names of the objects, an unbounded Unicode String

mal:field.name: planningRequestDefinitionIdList
mal:field.comment: List of Planning Request Definition IDs

mal:requestIP.name: getDefinition
mal:requestIP.comment: The addDefinition operation allows a consumer to define one or more taks that do not currently exist. The new TaskDefinition object is expected to be stored in the COM archive by the provider of the action service.

mal:field.name: planningRequestDefinitionId
mal:field.comment: The IF of Planning Request Definition

mal:field.name: planningRequestDefinition
mal:field.comment: The new Planning Request Definition

mal:requestIP.name: addDefinition
mal:requestIP.comment: The addDefinition operation allows a consumer to define one or more taks that do not currently exist. The new TaskDefinition object is expected to be stored in the COM archive by the provider of the action service.

mal:request.comment: Adds Planning Request Definition. Definition serves as a blueprint for instances.

mal:field.name: planningRequestDefinition
mal:field.comment: The new Planning Request Definition

mal:field.name: planningRequestDefinitionId
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request Definition ID

mal:errorRef.comment: One of the supplied Planning Request Definitions contains an invalid name

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains the indexes of the erroneous values from the originating list supplied

mal:errorRef.comment: One or more of the Planning Request Definitions being added has supplied a Planning Request name that is already in use in the domain

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains the indexes of the erroneous values from the originating request list

mal:submitIP.name: updateDefinition
mal:submitIP.comment: Updates Planning Request Definition referenced by Planning Request ID

mal:submit.comment: Updates Planning Request Definition referenced by Planning Request ID

mal:field.name: planningRequestDefinitionId
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request Definition ID

mal:field.name: planningRequestDefinition
mal:field.comment: The new Planning Request Definition

mal:errorRef.comment: One of the supplied Planning Request Definitions is trying to change its name

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains the indexes of the erroneous values from the originating list supplied

mal:errorRef.comment: One of the supplied Planning Request Definition object instance identifiers is unknown

mal:extraInformation.comment: The indexes of the error values shall be contained in the extra information field

mal:submitIP.name: removeDefinition
mal:submitIP.comment: Removes Planning Request Definition by ID

mal:field.name: planningRequestDefinitionId
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request Definition ID

mal:errorRef.comment: One of the supplied Planning Request Definition object instance identifiers is unknown

mal:extraInformation.comment: The indexes of the error values shall be contained in the extra information field

mal:requestIP.name: listTaskDefinition
mal:requestIP.comment: Retrieves Task Definition based on Identifier (name)

mal:field.name: identifierList
mal:field.comment: List of names of the objects, an unbounded Unicode String

mal:field.name: taskDefinitionIds
mal:field.comment: List of task definition IDs

mal:requestIP.name: addTaskDefinition
mal:requestIP.comment: Adds Task Definition. Definition serves as a blueprint for instances

mal:request.comment: The supplied definition shall hold the definition to be added. The name field of the supplied TaskDefinition structures must not be NULL, the wildcard '*', or empty (an INVALID error shall be returned in this case). The supplied name must be unique for the domain of the provider otherwise a DUPLICATE error will be raised.

mal:field.name: taskDefinition
mal:field.comment: The Task Definition

mal:response.comment: The response shall contain new task definition ID

mal:field.name: taskDefinitionId
mal:field.comment: The Task Definition ID

mal:errorRef.comment: One of the supplied task definitions contains an invalid task name.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains the indexes of the erroneous values from the originating list supplied.

mal:errorRef.comment: One or more of the action definitions being added has supplied an task name that is already in use in the domain.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains the indexes of the erroneous values from the originating request list.

mal:submitIP.name: updateTaskDefinition
mal:submitIP.comment: Updates Task Definition referenced by Task Definition ID.

mal:submit.comment: The submitted task definition shall hold the definition to be modified. The first list shall contain the object instance identifier of the actions definition to be updated. The second contain the replacement action definition.

mal:field.name: taskDefinitionId
mal:field.comment: The Task Definition ID

mal:field.name: taskDefinition
mal:field.comment: The Task Definition

mal:errorRef.comment: One of the supplied task definitions is trying to change its task name.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains the indexes of the erroneous values from the originating list supplied.

mal:errorRef.comment: One of the supplied task definition object instance identifiers is unknown.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The indexes of the error values shall be contained in the extra information field.

mal:submit.comment: The supplied definiton holds the object instance identifier of the definition to be removed from the provider. The definition may contain the wildcard value of '0'. If a provided definition object instance identifier does not include a wildcard and does not match an existing definition then this operation shall fail with an UNKNOWN error. If a matched definition is still being used by an executing task instance then this operation shall not fail. Removed definitions still exist in the COM archive but shall not be allowed to be referenced by new task instances. The operation shall either completely succeed or fail, in the case of a fail no definitions shall be removed.

mal:field.name: taskDefinitionId
mal:field.comment: The Task Definition ID

mal:errorRef.comment: One of the supplied task definition object instance identifiers is unknown.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The indexes of the error values shall be contained in the extra information field.

mal:composite.name: PlanningRequest
mal:composite.comment: Planning Request is the main service object of the Planning Request service. Planning Request contains Tasks. Planning Request always relates to exactly one Planning Request Definition

mal:field.name: id
mal:field.comment: ID of a Planning Request. The ID is generated by the service provider upon PR submission

mal:field.name: planningRequestStatusId
mal:field.comment: ID of the planning request status

mal:field.name: planningRequestDefinitionId
mal:field.comment: ID of a Planning Request Definition

mal:field.name: name
mal:field.comment: Name describes the Planning Request submission

mal:field.name: description
mal:field.comment: Description, or any other free text, that describes the Planning Request submission

mal:field.name: source
mal:field.comment: The origin on the request, eg from Flight Dynamics or SOC

mal:field.name: destination
mal:field.comment: The target system of the Planning Request

mal:field.name: argumentValues
mal:field.comment: The argument values. The arguments are in the order of argument definitions in the Planning Request definition object

mal:field.name: tasks
mal:field.comment: The list of tasks

mal:composite.name: PlanningRequestDefinition
mal:composite.comment: The Planning Request Definition defines a 'class' or a 'type' of Planning Requests. Each Planning Request is associated with exactly one Planning Request Definition. The 'arguments' of the definition are used for defining those fields that are not standardized in the Planning Request

mal:field.name: id
mal:field.comment: ID of the Planning Request Definition. The ID is generated by the service provider upon submission

mal:field.name: name
mal:field.comment: The name of the Planning Request definition

mal:field.name: description
mal:field.comment: The description of the Planning Request Definition

mal:field.name: validateOnSubmit
mal:field.comment: Indicates that the Planning Request is validated on submission. Validation means that the Planning Request fields are checked for correctness/integrity, eg dates are valid

mal:field.name: arguments
mal:field.comment: The argument definitions. The argument definitions specify the type of arguments. The arguments can be used for mission specific fields

mal:field.name: taskDefinitions
mal:field.comment: The list of task definitions

mal:composite.name: PlanningRequestFilter
mal:composite.comment: This data structure defines a planning request filter composite

mal:composite.name: TaskDefinition
mal:composite.comment: The Task Definition defines a 'class' or a 'type' of Tasks. Each Task is associated with exactly one Task Definition. The 'arguments' of the definition are used for defining those fields that are not standardized in the Task

mal:field.name: planningRequestDefinitionId
mal:field.comment: ID of the Task Definition. The ID is generated by the service provider upon submission

mal:field.name: id
mal:field.comment: ID of the Task Definition. The ID is generated by the service provider upon submission

mal:field.name: name
mal:field.comment: The name of the Task definition

mal:field.name: description
mal:field.comment: The description of the Task definition

mal:field.name: arguments
mal:field.comment: The argument definitions. The argument definitions specify the type of arguments. The arguments can be used for mission specific fields

mal:field.name: subTasks
mal:field.comment: The sub Task definition. Defines which TasksDefinitions are allowed to the the sub Tasks

mal:composite.name: Task
mal:composite.comment: This data structure defines a task definition composite

mal:field.name: id
mal:field.comment: ID of the Task. The ID is generated by the service provider upon a Task submission

mal:field.name: taskDefinitionId
mal:field.comment: ID of the task definition

mal:field.name: name
mal:field.comment: Name of the Planning Request submission

mal:field.name: description
mal:field.comment: Description, or any other free text, that describes the Planning Request submission

mal:field.name: subTasks
mal:field.comment: List of sub Tasks. The sub Tasks are in the order of sub Task definitions in the Task definition object

mal:field.name: argumentValues
mal:field.comment: The argument values. The arguments are in the order of argument definitions in the Task definition object

mal:field.name: taskStatusId
mal:field.comment: ID of task status

mal:field.name: timeTriggers
mal:field.comment: The time triggers

mal:field.name: eventTriggers
mal:field.comment: The event triggers

mal:field.name: predecessorTasks
mal:field.comment: Predecessor Tasks

mal:composite.name: TaskStatus
mal:composite.comment: The status of a Task. The Task status tells where the Task is in its life cycle. Problems with a Task may be related to planning or execution

mal:field.name: taskId
mal:field.comment: ID of the task

mal:field.name: submittedNotValidated
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request has been submitted. The input fields have not been validated for consistency by the service provider. Example consistency validation is checking for invalid fields. Consistency checking does not include planning conflicts

mal:field.name: submittedValidated
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request has been submitted, and the input fields have been validated for consistency

mal:field.name: submittedInvalid
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request has been submitted, but one or more fields have errors

mal:field.name: accepted
mal:field.comment: The planning request has been accepted by the planning system for the inclusion to the plan

mal:field.name: rejected
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request has not been accepted by the planning system

mal:field.name: planConflict
mal:field.comment: The planning system cannot include the Planning Request to the plan due to a (resource/temporal) conflict

mal:field.name: planned
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request has been included in a Plan

mal:field.name: scheduled
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request has been scheduled

mal:field.name: distributedForExecution
mal:field.comment: The scheduled Planning Request has been distributed to the destination system

mal:field.name: executeCompleted
mal:field.comment: The scheduled Planning Request has been successfully executed

mal:field.name: executeFailed
mal:field.comment: The scheduled Planning Request execution has failed

mal:composite.name: PlanningRequestStatus
mal:composite.comment: The status of a Planning Request. The Planning Request status tells where the Planning Request is in its life cycle. Problems with a Planning Request may be related to the Planning Request Object, or the Tasks that are part of the Planning Request

mal:field.name: planningRequestId
mal:field.comment: ID of the planning request

mal:field.name: submittedNotValidated
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request has been submitted. The input fields have not been validated for consistency by the service provider. Example consistency validation is checking for invalid fields. Consistency checking does not include planning conflicts

mal:field.name: submittedValidated
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request has been submitted, and the input fields have been validated for consistency

mal:field.name: submittedInvalid
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request has been submitted, but one or more fields have errors

mal:field.name: accepted
mal:field.comment: The planning request has been accepted by the planning system for the inclusion to the plan

mal:field.name: rejected
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request has not been accepted by the planning system

mal:field.name: planConflict
mal:field.comment: The planning system cannot include the Planning Request to the plan due to a (resource/temporal) conflict

mal:field.name: planned
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request has been included in a Plan

mal:field.name: scheduled
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request has been scheduled

mal:field.name: distributedForExecution
mal:field.comment: The scheduled Planning Request has been distributed to the destination system

mal:field.name: executeCompleted
mal:field.comment: The scheduled Planning Request has been successfully executed

mal:field.name: executeFailed
mal:field.comment: The scheduled Planning Request execution has failed

mal:composite.name: StatusTag
mal:composite.comment: This data structure defines a status tag composite

mal:composite.name: PlanningRequestResponse
mal:composite.comment: Response object for a Planning Request submission. The Planning Request need not be validated, when the PlanningRequestResponse is sent back to the client. PlanningRequestResponse merely indicates that a PlanningRequest has been received by the planning request service provider

mal:field.name: id
mal:field.comment: ID of a Planning Request response

mal:field.name: date
mal:field.comment: The date of the Planning Request response

mal:field.name: planningRequest
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request

mal:field.name: planningRequestStatus
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request

mal:field.name: resourceAvailability
mal:field.comment: The Planning Request

mal:composite.name: ResourceAvailability
mal:composite.comment: ResourceAvailability connects a Task and a Resource. If it is known what Resources are required for a Task execution, then ResourceAvailability lists the intervals, where it is possible to execute the Task. This is useful in the case where a Task timing constraints lead to a conflict, and the planning system offers alternative timing constraints ResourceAvailabilityInterval).

mal:field.name: resourceId
mal:field.comment: The ID of the resource

mal:field.name: intervals
mal:field.comment: List of Intervals

mal:field.name: taskId
mal:field.comment: ID of the Task

mal:composite.name: ResourceAvailabilityInterval
mal:composite.comment: This data structure defines a resource availability composite

mal:field.name: earliestStartTime
mal:field.comment: The earliest start of the Task/Activity

mal:field.name: latestStartTime
mal:field.comment: The latest start of the Task/Activity

mal:field.name: latestEndTime
mal:field.comment: The latest end of the Task/Activity

mal:field.name: earliestStartEvent
mal:field.comment: The earliest start of the Task/Activity

mal:field.name: latestStartEvent
mal:field.comment: The latest start of the Task/Activity

mal:field.name: latestEndEvent
mal:field.comment: The latest end of the Task/Activity

mal:composite.name: Audit
mal:composite.comment: Audit is an encapsulation of version related information

mal:field.name: version
mal:field.comment: The version number. The version number format is not standardized

mal:field.name: dateCreated
mal:field.comment: The creation date

mal:field.name: dateModified
mal:field.comment: The date of latest change

mal:field.name: planningRequestId
mal:field.comment: ID of the Planning Request
